name: ts-nameof-transforms-ts
description: TypeScript compiler transforms for ts-nameof packages.
author: David Sherret

scripts.install-dependencies: cd ../tests-common && yarn install && yarn run build && cd ../common && yarn install && yarn run build && cd ../transforms-common && yarn install && yarn run build && cd ../transforms-ts
scripts.create-links: symlink-dir ../tests-common/dist src/external/test-common && symlink-dir ../common/dist src/external/common && symlink-dir ../transforms-common/dist src/external/transforms-common
scripts.prepare: yarn run install-dependencies && yarn run create-links
